name: Cost That Meeting
description:
Have you ever been in a meeting and wondered how much the salaries of those around you must add up to? This app will work it out and allow you to share the result on Facebook and Twitter!

You can add up individual salaries and/or multiply a salary by the number of people in the room. Salaries can be added in per-year or per-hour format.

When you're ready, start the timer and watch the cost add up. If you need to close the app so your boss doesn't notice - that's not a problem; open it later when it's safe to do so.
